snippet: The advance was carried out by the same coalition of Islamist groups that seized the provincial capital, the city of Idlib.
abstract: Insurgents advance further in Syrian province of Idlib; militants are same coalition of Islamist groups, including Qaeda-affiliated Nusra Front, that took city of Idlib.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Maher Samaan contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The advance was carried out by the same coalition of Islamist groups that seized the provincial capital, the city of Idlib.

headline.main: Insurgents Continue Advance in Syria, Keeping Pressure on Government Forces
headline.print_headline: Insurgents Continue Advance in Syria, Keeping Pressure on Government Forces
